ServiceOptionsType.description: This object describes service options, data transformations and output formats.

SubsetType.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported subsetting requests.

SupportedProjections.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported projections types.

InterpolationType.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported interpolation types.

SupportedFormats.description: The project element describes the list of names of the formats supported by the service.

SubsetTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the subset type of the variable.

ProjectionTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the projection type of the variable.

InterpolationTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the interpolation type of the variable.

FormatType.description: The SupportedFormats element contains a list of file formats supported by this service.

Name.description: The name of the layer available from the service.

RelativePath.description: Path relative to the root universal resource locator for the layer.

Type.description: Specification of the type of the service.

Version.description: Specification of the version of the Service.

Description.description: A brief description of the service.

OnlineResource.description: This element describes the service root universal resource locator.

ServiceOptions.description: This element contains important information about the Unique Resource Locator for the service.

Layer.description: This element is used to provide a list of layer names (identifiers) which are available via the service.
